summary: Friends, enemies, acquaintances, and family of porn star John Holmes recall their experiences with him, from his childhood to his eventual death from AIDS in 1988.
cast: Linda Adrain|Bill Amerson|Denise Amerson|Sean 'Duke' Amerson|Paul Thomas Anderson|Tom Blake|Bunny Bleu|Paul Cambria|Bob Chinn|Ilona Staller|David Clark|Ron Coen|Dawn Schiller|Mitchell Egers|Don Fernando|Larry Flynt|Al Goldstein|Annette Haven|Bobby Hollander|Jim Holliday|Misty Dawn|Sharon Holmes|Mike Horner|Ron Jeremy|John Leslie|Vonda Lia|Sharon Mitchell|Kitten Natividad|Richard Pacheco|Juliet Anderson|Ann Perry|Ernest Paul Roebuck|Candida Royalle|Mike Sager|'Reb' Sawitz|Joel Sussman|Kenneth Turan|Bob Vosse|John Holmes|Rodger Jacobs|Gloria Leonard|William Margold
title: Wadd: The Life & Times of John C. Holmes
